languages.text: {n}Губернатор всплескивает руками.{/n} "Правда? А я был уверен, что это распространенные бестии! Тут я слегка оконфузился, но буду рад поговорить о чем-то еще".

traits.locale_text: "Вроде бы да. Когда-то, в далекой юности. Увы, память... уже не та".

languages.text: {n}The governor throws up his hands.{/n} "Can they? And I was sure they were a common beastie! I might have embarrassed myself there, but I would be glad to talk about something else."
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор всплескивает руками.{/n} "Правда? А я был уверен, что это распространенные бестии! Тут я слегка оконфузился, но буду рад поговорить о чем-то еще".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Governor throws up his hands.{/n} "Can they? And I was sure they were a common beastie! I got a little embarrassed there, but I would be happy to talk about something else."

{n}The governor throws up his hands.{/n} "Can they? And I was sure they were a common beastie! I might have embarrassed myself there, but I would be glad to talk about something else."

languages.text: {n}总督举起了双手。{/n}“真的吗？我还以为它们是随处可见的牲畜呢！这个话题可能确实涉及到了我的知识盲区，不过我很乐意谈些别的事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}The governor throws up his hands.{/n} "Can they? And I was sure they were a common beastie! I might have embarrassed myself there, but I would be glad to talk about something else."

traits.locale_text: {n}总督举起了双手。{/n}“真的吗？我还以为它们是随处可见的牲畜呢！这个话题可能确实涉及到了我的知识盲区，不过我很乐意谈些别的事情。”

languages.text: {n}El gobernador se lleva las manos a la cabeza.{/n} «¿No me diga? ¡Y yo que creía que eran bestias corrientes! Me he puesto en ridículo yo solo, pero me encantaría hablar de cualquier otro tema».
languages.original_text: {n}The governor throws up his hands.{/n} "Can they? And I was sure they were a common beastie! I might have embarrassed myself there, but I would be glad to talk about something else."

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador se lleva las manos a la cabeza.{/n} «¿No me diga? ¡Y yo que creía que eran bestias corrientes! Me he puesto en ridículo yo solo, pero me encantaría hablar de cualquier otro tema».

languages.text: {n}Vali, ellerini havaya kaldırıyor.{/n} "Öyle mi? Bunların epey yaygın olduğunu sanıyordum! Kendimi utandırdım, kusura bakmayın ama başka bir konu konuşursak memnun olurum."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor throws up his hands.{/n} "Can they? And I was sure they were a common beastie! I might have embarrassed myself there, but I would be glad to talk about something else."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vali, ellerini havaya kaldırıyor.{/n} "Öyle mi? Bunların epey yaygın olduğunu sanıyordum! Kendimi utandırdım, kusura bakmayın ama başka bir konu konuşursak memnun olurum."

languages.text: {n}総督はお手上げだと諦める。{/n}「そうなのですか？よくいる獣だと思っていました！恥をかいたと思いましたが、何か他のことについて話せたら嬉しいです」
languages.original_text: {n}The governor throws up his hands.{/n} "Can they? And I was sure they were a common beastie! I might have embarrassed myself there, but I would be glad to talk about something else."

traits.locale_text: {n}総督はお手上げだと諦める。{/n}「そうなのですか？よくいる獣だと思っていました！恥をかいたと思いましたが、何か他のことについて話せたら嬉しいです」

languages.text: {n}Le gouverneur lève les mains en l'air.{/n} « Vraiment ? Dire que je les prenais pour de simples créatures on ne peut plus ordinaires... ! Je me suis peut-être mis dans l'embarras... mais je serais plus que ravi de parler d'autre chose. »
languages.original_text: {n}The governor throws up his hands.{/n} "Can they? And I was sure they were a common beastie! I might have embarrassed myself there, but I would be glad to talk about something else."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gouverneur lève les mains en l'air.{/n} « Vraiment ? Dire que je les prenais pour de simples créatures on ne peut plus ordinaires... ! Je me suis peut-être mis dans l'embarras... mais je serais plus que ravi de parler d'autre chose. »

languages.text: {n}Der Gouverneur wirft die Hände in die Luft.{/n} "Ach ja? Und ich war mir sicher, die Biester gibt es überall! Da habe ich mich wohl ein wenig blamiert, aber ich spreche gerne über etwas anderes."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor throws up his hands.{/n} "Can they? And I was sure they were a common beastie! I might have embarrassed myself there, but I would be glad to talk about something else."
